long_description: The Alpha SV Jacket for women ice climbers and alpinists is the toughest waterproof, breathable GORE-TEX(R) Pro hard shell from Arc'teryx for severe alpine environments. Exceptionally hard-wearing N80p-X GORE-TEX Pro 3L nylon face fabric delivers long-term resistance to abrasion. Durable micro-grid woven backing reduces weight and is also highly abrasion resistant. Jacket features a Durable Water Repellent finish that beads up and sheds precipitation. Athletic patterning provides room for 3 layers while facilitating movement. Helmet-compatible StormHood(TM) turns with your head and won't obscure vision; cinches with 1-handed drawcords. WaterTight(TM) pit zippers permit rapid ventilation. Removable HemLock(TM) inserts keep the jacket in position when worn underneath a climbing harness. 2 crossover chest pockets are compatible with harnesses and packs, and are easy to see into. 2 laminated internal pockets; 1 sleeve pocket. Arc'teryx Alpha SV Jacket for women protects against the most severe weather conditions.
short_description: The Alpha SV Jacket for women ice climbers and alpinists is the toughest waterproof, breathable GORE-TEX(R) Pro hard shell from Arc'teryx for severe alpine environments.
